summary.span: Gets the ordinal number of the column containing the table cell or item.

span.span: Gets the ordinal number of the column containing the table cell or item.

value.span: 一个从零开始的序号表示包含表单元格或项的列。

span.span: A zero-based ordinal number representing the column containing the table cell or item.

remarks.format: ## Examples 在以下示例中，侦听器声明来跟踪遍历返回的表容器中的表项。In the following example, an listener is declared to track the traversal of table items within a table container. 每次焦点更改事件时，记录项属性。Item properties are recorded upon each focus changed event.
